title: Gold + team looking to round out our roster!
body:
We are currently looking for the roles listed below!

Jungle

ADC

Support

Please Fill this out and and ill get back to as many people as i can.

Rank -
Role - 
Timezone - 
Can you make practices scheduled a 9pm est (that's our set practice time the days can vary though) - 
Top 3 champs - 
Are you willing to grind and put forward the effort into becoming a good and talented team & player -

replies.body:
Rank - Ended Season Gold 4 
Role - ADC
Timezone - GMT 
Can you make practices scheduled a 9pm est (that's our set practice time the days can vary though) - Yes
Top 3 champs - Ashe, Varus, Ezreal
Are you willing to grind and put forward the effort into becoming a good and talented team & player - YES

Rank - Plat 3
Role - Supp
Timezone - CST
Can you make practices scheduled a 9 pm est - Yes
Top 3 champs - Janna, Nami, Leona
Are you willing to grind and put forward the effort into becoming a good and talented team & player - yes

Rank - G4
Role - Supp
Timezone - EST
Can you make practices scheduled a 9pm est (that's our set practice time the days can vary though) - sure can
Top 3 champs - Leona, Morgana, Nami (can play most supports at gold+ level)
Are you willing to grind and put forward the effort into becoming a good and talented team & player - yup

Rank- G4 peak G1
Role - Jungle and Top
Timezone - Central
I can make practices just about whenever
Top 3 Champs - Rengar, Zac, Vi for jung   ......   Yasuo, Nasus, Ornn for top
I willing to do whatever needs to be done
If they haven't picked you up yet, message Chef at our discord channel https://discord.gg/Z2zzrjB

Rank - Plat 4
Role - Support
Timezone - Eastern
Can you make practices scheduled a 9pm est (that's our set practice time the days can vary though) -Probably most of the time except when working
Top 3 champs - Alistar, Shen, VelKoz
Are you willing to grind and put forward the effort into becoming a good and talented team & player - Si senor
If they haven't picked you up yet, message Chef at our discord channel https://discord.gg/Z2zzrjB
I'm Silver 5 (I know it's low) but I'd be more than happy to play Support.

Rank: Plat 5
Role: Junngle
Time zone: Est
Champs: Sejauni, Rammus, Zac. I prefer rank bungler but also know khazix and kayn well

Rank - Diamond 5
Role - adc
Timezone - central
Can you make practices scheduled a 9pm est (that's our set practice time the days can vary though) - yes depending on days
Top 3 champs - Twitch, trist, xayah, jhin
Are you willing to grind and put forward the effort into becoming a good and talented team & player - yes im talented or think i am and want to join an org to get my feet wet in the competitive team side of league and grow as a player.

Ign: Brèwha   (sorry for the weird character in my name)

Rank - Silver 3 atm.  I can prove Gold skills if you let me get in a game
Role - Jungle
Timezone - EST
Can you make practices scheduled a 9pm est (that's our set practice time the days can vary though) - Yes sir
Top 3 champs - j4,Lee sin, Sejuani
Are you willing to grind and put forward the effort into becoming a good and talented team & player - Absolutely
